description: Episode of Series "Four corners (Television program)". A "Four Corners" program which discusses the different attitudes people have towards television and newspapers. The editor of The Age newspaper gives his views on the reason for the poor credibility rating of newspapers as against that of television. Includes commentary by Graeme Perkins, Mike Willesee, John Temple and Ross Symonds.
